alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pittsburg County through 315 AM CDT... At 230 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Ashland, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Hartshorne... Krebs... Savanna... Alderson... Ashland... Mcalester Regional Airport... Haywood... Blocker... Haileyville... Dow... Bache... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
